医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
皮特研究发现了致命形式的卵巢癌的新型触发因素匹兹堡大学的研究人员已经确定了一种致命形式的卵巢癌的新型触发因素：属于输卵管支撑组织或基质中的祖细胞的一部分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/pitt-study-uncovers-a-a-novel-trigger-of-deadly-form-form-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/pitt-study-uncovers-a-a-novel-trigger-deadly-form-form-form-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1130307-6400-4C1B-BA4E-5AA912B106CD Fri, 14 Mar 2025 14:17:24 -0400 Pitt study uncovers a novel trigger of deadly form of ovarian cancer
新实验室工具识别与金黄色葡萄球菌作斗争的病毒新开发的实验室工具可以在几个小时内有助于识别特定的病毒，这些病毒可用于破坏危险的致病细菌金黄色葡萄球菌的变体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-laboratory-tool-indistifies-viruses-to-combat-staphylococcus-aureus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-laboratory-tool-indistifies-viruses-to-combat-to-combat-staphylococcus-aureus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e30218b-3d68-448d-b60a-b60a-b2b69f96b095 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 13:52:00 -0400 New laboratory tool identifies viruses to combat Staphylococcus aureus
新研究旨在揭开多囊性肾脏疾病的遗传奥秘多囊肾脏疾病（PKD）是导致囊肿簇在肾脏形成的遗传疾病家族，是最常见的遗传疾病之一，影响了美国约50万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-research-aims-to-unravel-genetic-genetic-mysteries-of-polycycystic-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-research-aims-to-unravel-genetic-genetic-mysteries-of-polycycystic-kidney-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f60d247-0ce8-42b0-a202-2dd4ff64841f Fri, 14 Mar 2025 13:32:56 -0400 New research aims to unravel genetic mysteries of polycystic kidney disease
与未出生的婴儿有关的母体高脂饮食当母亲吃得很高的脂肪和糖时，他们的未出生婴儿会产生肝脏胁迫，从而持续到早期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/maternal-high-fat-fat-diets-linked to-liver-to-liver-to-liver-to-liver-to-in-babies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/maternal-high-fat-fat-diets-linked to-liver-to-liver-to-liver-to-liver-to-in-in-unborn-babies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e1abd16-4e02-4e6b-b3dc-f90f116999351 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 13:17:47 -0400 Maternal high-fat diets linked to liver stress in unborn babies
新的治疗方法显示了儿科高级神经胶质瘤的希望脑肿瘤仍然是儿童癌症死亡最常见的原因。小儿高级神经胶质瘤（PHGG）尤其是一个大多数致命疾病组，中位生存时间在诊断后不到18个月，治疗选择有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-therapeutic-papphack-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-pediatric--pediatric-high grade-gliomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/new-therapeutic-appacher-shows-shows-promise-promise-for-pediatric--petiatric-high grade-gliomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1628F644-ECF7-4BEC-896E-9ACC94986342 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 13:09:00 -0400 New therapeutic approach shows promise for pediatric high-grade gliomas
社会优势降低了与年龄有关的疾病的风险，并减慢了衰老具有良好社会经济状况（例如高收入或教育水平）的人面临与年龄有关的疾病的风险降低，并且比同龄同龄人的生物衰老迹象更少，发现由伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/Social-Advantage-Reduces-resces-risk-og-og--gage-diseases-and-slows-slows-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/social-advantage-reduces-resces-risk-risk-og--gage-diseases-and-slows-and-slows-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87EB0368-7220-4AAC-A51B-CFE860C3B242 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 12:55:48 -0400 Social advantage reduces risk of age-related diseases and slows aging
联合国麻醉药品委员会将六种物质置于国际控制之后根据世界卫生组织（WHO）的建议，联合国麻醉药品委员会（CND）决定将五种新的精神活性物质和一种药物放在国际控制下。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/un-commission-mons-mons-on-narcotic-drugs-places-places-six-substances--substances-under-international-internation-control-control-following-who-recommendations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/un-commission-mommession-on-narcotic-drugs-places-places-six-substances-under-sud-substances-under-international-control-follows-following-who-who-who-recommendations.aspx#Comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A3AC8A6-7B6A-4475-8F87-B7184BE6A5FD Fri, 14 Mar 2025 07:19:10 -0400 UN Commission on Narcotic Drugs places six substances under international control following WHO recommendations
进步主义者在加利福尼亚寻求健康隐私保护，但Newsom可以拒绝当患者走进计划生育诊所时，一家消费者数据公司将其确切的位置出售给针对有针对性广告的反堕胎组。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/progressives-seek-health-privacy-protections-in-california-california-but-newsom-could-balk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/progressives-seek-seek-health-privacy-protections-in-california-california-but-newsom-could-balk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5412b6aA-26fd-4C52-4C52-813D-D6557C1AAAA1D Fri, 14 Mar 2025 06:52:27 -0400 Progressives seek health privacy protections in California, but Newsom could balk
Wehi团队在与帕金森氏病的斗争中取得了长足的进步WEHI研究人员在反对帕金森氏病的斗争中取得了巨大的飞跃，解决了长达数十年的谜团，这为开发新药治疗这种病铺平了道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wehi-team-makes-makes-major-major-strides-in-the-the-fight-against-parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/wehi-team-makes-makes-major-major-strides-in-the-the-fight-against-parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee68E719-498C-498C-47F0-9C1C-3A571933BA4BE Fri, 14 Mar 2025 00:21:37 -0400 WEHI team makes major strides in the fight against Parkinson's disease
研究探讨了严重的三尖瓣反流对AFMR患者的影响心房功能二尖瓣反流（AFMR）是一种与高心力衰竭相关的MR类型，强调了了解其预后因素的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-explores-impact-cract-ever-severe-tricuspid-regurgitation-in-afmr-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250314/study-explores-impact-impact-of-severe-tricuspid-regurgitation-in-regurgitation-in-afmr-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b1e538f-9E4F-4B35-4B35-AC1F-68075AE488B8 Fri, 14 Mar 2025 00:12:40 -0400 Study explores impact of severe tricuspid regurgitation in AFMR patients
